to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.impl

Class AccessoryCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.impl.AccessoryCommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ICommandListener, IAccessoryCommunication, IAccessoryCommunicationListener

    public class AccessoryCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAccessoryCommunication, ICommandListener
    This class communicates with the µController. It is realized with a message queue: It uses a Handler that post the message (a AbstractCommand) to a communication thread. The thread sends the message and wait until it gets the answer.
    Author:
    sven

      private Handler mainThreadHandler
      A Handler associated with the applications main thread (the one with the activities).
      private java.lang.Object monitor
      A monitor object, that is used to ensure that the communicationThreadHandler is set after start of communicationThread before startCommunication() returns.

      The OutputStream to send message to the µController.

      Version of the implemented protocol between µController and Host.

      Number of bytes of a response message.

        private java.lang.Thread communicationThread

      • connectionInitialized

        public void connectionInitialized()
        The connection has been successfully initialized. This means that the protocol version on µController matches with this version and we received the features. (Post message into the main thread.)
